channel.title: Gustav Janssons devlog
channel.description: This blog is a try to me keep motivates and a way to see my progress on my current projects. Let’s see how it goes!

item.title: Week 32
item.description: This week I didn’t do much, but after much consideration I moved all the euphoria source to a src folder so that the project root is a bit cleaner.

item.title: Week 31
item.description: Theese past weeks I spent in the hospital and recovering from said experience. Nothing major was done really mostly config/dotfiles changes. Hopefully I will get back to euphoria I netflix will stop interfering :)

item.title: Week 26
item.description: This week I mostly watched netfix and such but I did manage to implement a simple fill tool for the pixel image editor.

item.title: Week 25
item.description: This week I changed to my main computer, started transfering my old PrettyGood.net from google code to github, and finally started working on euphoria again. This time I started working on a custom pixel editing program. It’s far from finished but I hope that it can be useful in a few weeks time for the GMTK game jam.

item.title: Week 24
item.description: This week I ported a old anagram application from c# to python, I published and updated old “engines”, one called hmtest and one called pwn-engine, so I could run them, but it turns out that none of them was that advanced. I also installed arch on my main, so either this week or the next my transition to arch will be complete

item.title: Week 23
item.description: This week I started refactoring bbcalc so it could in the future handle generating truth tables, and I physically moved things around so I now use arch as my main computer. It will probably be a week or two until I install it on my main machine, but not too long since this hardware isn’t really health…

item.title: Week 22
item.description: This week I completed my kodsnack gamejam, and started on porting one of my filemover programs from c#+winforms to python+curses

item.title: Week 21
item.description: This week I installed arch on a desktop and started working on my entry for the 2 week kodsnack spelsylt gamejam

item.title: Week 20
item.description: This week I started on a lsp interface for fel.

item.title: Week 19
item.description: This week I continued my work on fel scripting language. I added a coverage report and started on the vscode extension for editing fel code.

item.title: Week 18
item.description: This week I worked on getting a gui sample up and running. Due to issues I also ended up creating a 2d sample. There are only a few issues left before I can continue on adding features to the ui

item.title: Week 17
item.description: This week I implemented the sprator algorithm. Next weeek I will probably add a test for the gui code. It has been missing a sample/test project a for a while now.

item.title: Week 16
item.description: This week I completed my cellular automata code generation. Up next should either be implementing a tetomino layout algorithm or fianlly completing the sprator algorithm. Decisions decisions.

item.title: Week 15
item.description: This week I created a collage tool and a palette extract tool. Neither are super fancy but something that I missed from my toolbag.

item.title: Week 14
item.description: This week I styled the doxygen output, added argparse tests and merged the new-argparse branch into master. I also started on integrating warnings from cpp-best-practices and it’s going to take some time to fix all of them.
